title: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the beloved in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com. Our topic is for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, a young man, and a divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream for a single girl? Seeing a single girl meeting her lover in a dream. Thinking about him a lot is evidence of her intense love for him and her desire to marry him soon. Seeing an unmarried woman meeting her lover in a dream is an indicator On the success of their romantic relationship and their imminent happy marriage. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lover crying in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman meeting her lover in a dream? Seeing a married woman meeting her lover in a dream announces her husband’s betrayal of her lover and trying to divorce him. Seeing a married woman meeting her lover in a dream indicates facing many problems. Of difficulties and problems with her husband, feeling sad and depressed with him, and the presence of a serious psychological crisis. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lover’s family in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream of a married woman talking with her ex-lover? Seeing a married woman talking with her ex-boyfriend in a dream indicates her strong thinking about him and her intense desire To return to him again. Seeing a former lover in a married woman’s dream is an indication that she is suffering from great problems and difficulties in raising her children. A pregnant married woman seeing her ex-lover in a dream is an indication that she was suffering from many problems and issues during pregnancy and childbirth. See also: The Beloved’s Prayer Written: What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman meeting her lover in a dream? Seeing a married woman meeting her lover in a dream indicates the presence of defects and problems in her married life, her strong desire to leave her husband and marry another man, and a feeling of constant sadness and depression. Seeing a married woman in a dream means overcoming all her sorrows And start a happy life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a man or lover jealous in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man seeing his girlfriend in a dream? A man sees his girlfriend in a dream and his excessive longing for her suggests that he meets a beautiful girl and a person characterized by beauty and tenderness. Seeing a man meeting an ugly girlfriend in a dream, this indicates his hatred and desire In divorcing his fiancée. A man seeing his girlfriend sick in a dream is a sign of many problems in his upcoming future. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lover cheating in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing her lover in a dream? A pregnant woman seeing her lover in a dream is an indication of her desire to see her old lover, and her deep regret. To live with her husband, and feel sad and miserable with him. Seeing a pregnant woman lying in her lover’s arms is an indication of her betrayal of her husband and severe neglect of him and her children. Seeing a suddenly pregnant woman with her lover in a dream is a sign of breaking off the relationship with the former lover and intense love for her husband. Seeing a pregnant woman leaving her lover in a dream appears She will soon have a happy pregnancy and a good boy. See also: The interpretation of seeing my ex-husband having sex with me in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing my beloved with another girl in a dream? Seeing my beloved with a girl

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a snake eating in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you the interpretation of seeing a snake eating in a complete dream. Perhaps many people saw in a dream the same thing eating a snake and were full of anxiety and fear regarding the interpretation of this dream. We have provided for you, our dear followers, all the meanings and elements so that you can know what is the interpretation of seeing a snake in its colors and shapes. Eating snakes just follow the rest of the article. Ibn Sirin completed the interpretation of eating a snake in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing snakes in a dream is full of visions that express the dreamer’s condition, because they sometimes indicate livelihood. He pointed out that seeing snake meat cooked and eating it is a dream that indicates strength and solidity. Satisfying desires and achieving the highest goals. Seeing oneself eating snake meat in a dream is full of visions that have the meaning of obtaining illicit money and eating people’s money unlawfully. The interpretation of seeing a boiled snake in a dream is full of successful projects and entering a stable period without problems, obstacles and wealth. Ibn Sirin explained In another narration, eating snake meat in a dream is complete, indicating that the dreamer has committed many sins and forbidden things in his life. What is the interpretation of seeing a snake eating a bowl for a woman? Eating a snake in a dream is complete for a common woman, and eating her head is one of the visions that indicate the approaching marriage and fulfillment. Goals and satisfying desires. Dreaming about eating the whole head of a snake means that a common woman will enter a period full of happiness and joy and will emerge from sadness and anguish. What is the interpretation of seeing a snake eating in a dream for a girl in full about the many mistakes she commits and falling into disobedience, sins and great corruption? Seeing a grilled snake in a dream It is full of unwanted visions that indicate major illnesses and problems, in addition to the death of a loved one. What is the interpretation of seeing a snake eating a married woman? Seeing a married woman eating a whole snake in a dream, and it was delicious and delicious, is good news, happiness, stability of her life with her husband, and peace of mind. Also, seeing a boiled snake in a dream full of women is a sign of sustenance, blessing, abundance of blessings, and evidence of work and support for children. Most interpretation scholars have indicated that catching and cooking snakes in a dream completely symbolizes kindness, money, satisfaction of desires, and reaching what one wants and seeks. What Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman eating a snake? The interpretation of seeing cooked snake meat in a dream shows a pregnant woman her ability to withstand problems, recover from illness, and improve health conditions. Seeing a snake being hunted and eating it in a dream is full of good news for the pregnant woman and an indication that God will bless her with a male child, and God knows what is in the wombs. What is the interpretation of seeing a black snake eating? Eating whole black snake meat in a dream is an unpleasant vision and indicates illness and major health problems that the dreamer will face. What is the interpretation of seeing a snake in its colors? The interpretation of seeing a white snake eating a whole one in a dream, and the dreamer catches it and cooks it, is A sign of the great blessings that he will enjoy and the abundant money that will come to him. The evidence for this vision indicates the blessing and improvement of living conditions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in a dream by senior interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in a dream: It is known that menstrual blood, as a normal menstrual cycle, causes pain, hormonal changes, and mood swings in women. This is reflected in her behavior as she becomes more stressed, tense and agitated. The psychological state at this time of the month is very bad, so this blood is not associated with positive things in real life. Does this apply to him in a dream? So, contact the site. Various signs entered. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in a dream as a good vision: The main researcher in the interpretation of dreams, Ibn Sirin, says that menstrual blood is good news, happiness, and evidence of progress toward the better. Heavy menstruation indicates achieving goals. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation In a dream, women generally carry kindness, as they will soon get rid of their psychological problems. This blood also indicates that the dreamer’s life will become better. If the dreamer is sick, this is a sign of her approaching recovery. Menstruation in a dream indicates wealth and great wealth. If a woman is in menopause and sees her period in her dream, this indicates renewal. Her activity and the fulfillment of her dreams. Unpleasant interpretations of the appearance of menstruation in a dream: Seeing menstrual blood in a dream can indicate major financial losses. If the blood is very abundant, this may indicate extreme poverty. If the color of the blood is black, this indicates a disease affecting the dreamer. If blood soaks into the clothes in In a dream, this indicates many problems and the dreamer’s instability. Menstrual blood indicates fatigue and mental disorder. Menstrual blood on clothes may indicate that the opinion has committed bad deeds in the past and is trying to get rid of them. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in a dream for a man: If the blood is black, this means missing good opportunities. And the following poverty. If the man is single and sees menstrual blood, this indicates the imminence of his marriage. If he is married, then this dream indicates the instability of his life with his wife. If the menstrual blood he sees is for his wife, then this indicates a stable and happy married life. If he works in trade, this is good news for the financial gains that He will get it. A dream about menstrual cycle in a man’s dream can also be interpreted as an indication of his many responsibilities. Seeing menstrual blood can be a sign for the dreamer of repentance for the sins he commits. If the blood is abundant, this indicates his injustice to the person, which led to his evil. If a man dreams that his wife is menstruating, this means That she will give birth, and God knows best. What does menstrual blood mean in one dream? Menstrual blood in a single woman’s dream indicates that she has made a great effort to get rid of her problems. Seeing menstrual blood on her clothes indicates wisdom and intelligence and that she will earn a lot of money. Also, seeing menstrual blood in small quantities on her clothes indicates Her superiority in life and her enjoyment of good health. Menstrual blood may be good news to relieve her sadness. A dream about menstruation in an unmarried woman’s dream can be interpreted as an indication of a close marriage for her. Al-Nabulsi, who is one of the scholars of dream interpretation, explains that seeing menstrual blood in the foreground indicates that the dreamer has a

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing images in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the pictures you saw pale? It shows that you feel stressed and anxious. The meaning of seeing the pictures black in color? It means disagreements with the other, if there are people. What is the interpretation of seeing pictures of single women if they buy a set of pictures? This means that her dreams will not come true What does it mean to see pictures of friends you know? It means the fulfillment of desires. What is the interpretation of seeing your old pictures in which you see your childhood? Evidence of your nostalgia for this age stage in your life. Interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream. If the pictures you saw were light in color, this means that you feel anxious. And tension. If people appear in the pictures and their pictures are blurry and faded, this means that the relationship between you and them is tense. If the pictures are black in color, it means quarrels with the other person, if there are people on them. Then you see black pictures without people appearing, it expresses your feeling Internal loneliness or chronic psychological conflicts. Interpretation of seeing old photos in a dream: If you dream of your old photos in which you see your childhood and youth, this indicates your nostalgia for that age stage of your life. If you are looking for old group photos, this means that you want to know the old relationships in your life Then see group pictures of people you do not know, perhaps a new job or marriage if you are single. Dream pictures by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said about pictures that they indicate the presence of false people in your life and these people have malicious intentions for you. They can harm you, if you carry a picture of yourself In a dream, it means that you want to start a new project, but this project will lose and you may be punished. If you have a bad relationship with some people and upload a photo of them, this means that you want to reconnect with them. See pictures for single people. Interpretation of pictures in a dream for a single woman if she buys a set of pictures , this means that her dreams will not come true. If he finds his picture in high places, this means the success of his projects or his promotion at work. After that, the interpretation of seeing pictures of friends he has met means the fulfillment of desires and special achievements at work. Dream pictures for married people. Dream interpretation of mobile phone pictures for a woman Married, and repeating photos randomly and untidy means that she will fall into misfortune. This disaster was designed by a group of stupid disabled people. Then, if she sees that she took a photo of someone she does not know, and put those photos in her pocket, this means betrayal by someone close to her. Dream pictures for married people. As for For a married man, pictures mean false rumors that he heard from others and believed them. Perhaps someone told him malicious words that harm his wife’s reputation, honor, and honesty. Then Ibn Sirin said that pictures are shocking news that you hear from those close to you and who believe in it.

title: Meaning of seeing war in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing war in a dream We examine with you through these lines the meaning of seeing war in a dream according to the interpretations of Muhammad bin Shirin, who confirmed that seeing wars in a dream usually brings predicaments and hardships, except for those whose work is linked to war, such as weapons manufacturers or leaders and soldiers. They see these wars in a dream as evidence. On prosperity and success according to the interpretations of Sheikh Al-Nabulsi. The meaning of seeing war in a dream by Ibn Sirin Muhammad bin Sirin said that seeing wars in a dream usually indicates calamities and sorrows. War in a dream is an indication of serious misfortunes and fears that befall the dreamer, and victory in wars is evidence of getting out of a difficult situation or misfortune. The death of the dreamer in a dream is evidence of a good ending for the dreamer. Wars in a dream also indicate illness, and it is said that they are a symbol of the anxiety that befalls the dreamer if they get married in a dream. Ibn Sirin explains some interpretations of seeing wars in a dream, the first is if the wars are between two armies or sultans, This is evidence of rebellion and the spread of disease. They are civil wars, so they are seen as a sign of high prices and strife. Accordingly, interpretations of dreams of wars vary depending on the incidents and places in the vision. They may indicate high or low prices, and may indicate the spread of diseases, epidemics, and disputes between people, which are generally interpreted as Devastation. And the destruction of the homeland and the disintegration of the nation. Interpretation of seeing wars in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi explains that seeing wars in a dream is evidence of deception, and seeing wars between people in a dream indicates great honor, narrow living, and freedom from deception and strife. Al-Nabulsi believes that the dreamer’s dream of fighting the people of falsehood is evidence of his victory. Religion.Interpretation of seeing war in one dream. It is said that seeing war in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a challenge to society’s morals and customs, while seeing war between countries indicates her parents’ quarrel and the ongoing conflict between them. Freedom from misfortunes and conflicts. Hearing the sounds of missiles in a dream indicates stress and tension in her life, and dreams of missiles and wars in general in a woman’s dream are evidence that her life is going through some rapid events and changes. Interpretation of a dream about wars in a married woman’s dream. It is said that a married woman seeing wars in a dream is evidence There are disputes and conflicts between members of her family, and if she participates in wars, this is evidence of her participation in the rebellion, and it can also indicate the marriage of her husband and the differences between them and the presence of some existing disputes between them. A war between two countries in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of disagreements between the elders of the family or between Members of her family and the husband’s family, and while it indicates the psychological conflict of the viewer, a woman’s vision of war in her country is evidence of strife, the spread of diseases, and high prices. Seeing the death of a woman married to a member of her family indicates his entry into the strife of this world and her forgetfulness of the afterlife, judgment, punishment, danger, and a quick escape from it. In the end, we hope we have provided you with detailed interpretations of seeing wars in a dream. Where interpretations differ h

title: Learn more about Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding an only child

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding an only child: It is normal for a pregnant woman to dream that she is breastfeeding a child because she is waiting for this moment, and a married woman who does not have children may see it as a kind of hope that her desire will come true, but what about the dream of breastfeeding a child in a dream for a woman who is not married or has children, This is our topic today. Here are the details. What is the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding an only child? Dreams related to breastfeeding a child can be related to the concepts of protection, guardianship, paternity, and creating and strengthening bonds between family members, even between people who feel very close to each other but are not biologically related. This vision carries many meanings that are difficult to enumerate until a person knows whether he is male or female? What does a baby look like? How does the dreamer feel about this experience? These are all detailed questions, which lead us to cast on their crews one of the signs mentioned by interpretive scholars. These are often seen by people who are planning to start a family and those who protect their loved ones a lot, and the girl who sees the dream may be one of them, so she saw in her dream that she is also taking care of them. Breastfeeding the child. The girl may miss the mother’s affection while she is alive. For example, the mother is immersed in her personal life away from her sons and daughters, which makes the viewer feel lonely and that there is no role model in her life, and there are those who push this feeling to wrong behaviors, and some of them do it. They do not allow themselves, but prefer to take care of others as a form of satisfaction. Some commentators said that a girl's failure in a romantic relationship may be the reason why she feels the need to be responsible for someone when she was abandoned by the one she thought would marry and protect her. Sometimes delaying marriage for years causes feelings of The girl is dreaming of motherhood, because she has almost given up on realizing this dream in reality. Breastfeeding a child in a dream for an unmarried woman can be a good sign that she will be able to establish healthy social relationships with those around her and that the child’s psychology will change for the better immediately after marriage. Interpretation of dreams To breastfeed the only child of Ibn Sirin. The imam said that the dream is an expression of the peace and psychological balance that the virgin feels despite all the problems and worries that she was exposed to in the past and that he found something that amuses her to think about this matter and its virtue. To leave the matter in the hands of the Almighty God because she believes that He chooses what is best for her anyway. If the child is hungry and screaming from excessive hunger and you cannot calm him down in any way, then the dream reflects his negative circumstances and feelings that are controlling him and which he should not give in to and that he is optimistic that the next better. Enough to put her trust in her Lord. If the girl can feed the child until he calms down and sleeps, she will fulfill a wish dear to herself related to her field of expertise. title: Interpretation of seeing a bag of money in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a bag of money in a dream? This question has recently spread throughout all social media platforms and Arab search engines, especially since we find that there are many who show great interest in the subject of dreams and the clues that express them, so we find that it is possible for many people to stop. The natural course of their lives is the result of one of the interpretations given in their dream. Although all the interpretations that a man can get for his dream are only the jurisprudence of interpreters, they are ultimately human, and the son of Adam makes mistakes, which means that these interpreters have a right. They may make mistakes, despite the fact that our beloved is chosen, may God bless him and grant him peace. He explained to us in one of his noble hadiths that dreams are the work of Satan, especially if the dreams are bad. While the visions come from God Almighty and are based on many questions that have been raised about the indications of seeing a bag of money in the dreamer’s dream, the aspects of the following lines will bear all The interpretations mentioned by the translators in this dream, through our article in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a bag of money in a dream. It is worth noting that we as Muslims know very well that belief in God’s decree of good and evil is one of the pillars of faith, as is faith in God, His books, His Messenger, and the Last Day in particular. Because the Lord of goodness only brings goodness, that is, everything that falls on the dreamer’s shoulders, whether that is one of the meanings of the dream, so what he saw in the dream has good meanings or not, is that he is relying on God, and it is sufficient for him, especially since it must be pointed out once again to All the interpretations proposed in the arena of dream interpretation, even those that will be mentioned in the aspects of our following lines, are only from the interpreters of God. He knows the unseen and therefore these interpretations may be affected and there may be some truth in them and at the same time they are not related to reality. The questions that were floating around this dream. According to interpreters, the dreamer seeing a bag of money in his dream is an indication that God will expand the dreamer’s scope of living from While listing the doors to his livelihood. The dreamer’s vision of a bag full of banknotes symbolizes that he has many loyal friends in his life. But if the bag is full of coins, then his dream in this case indicates that he will face many problems and difficulties. In addition to the dreamer’s vision of... Dreaming of a bag full of dollar bills, this is a sign that he will succeed in traveling in the coming days. Also, the dreamer seeing a bag full of bills is an indication that he will inherit a large inheritance and will be one of the richest people without taking the trouble of trying. The dreamer seeing a bag full of money on the street In reality, he is going through financial difficulties and is not working, indicating that he will find a valuable opportunity to work in the coming days. In addition, the dreamer seeing a bag full of money in his dream, especially if he is suffering from problems and fears, is an indication that God will relieve him of his distress. And his distress will be alleviated in the near future. In addition, the dreamer’s vision of a bag full of money in h

title: Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream is one of the dreams that has different connotations and meanings, so one is good and the other has a negative meaning. We will try to shed light on some of these meanings by presenting a group of visions with their interpretations by the most important dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, in order to allow the reader to get acquainted with some of the meanings and expressions of seeing a sword in a dream, but with the need to remember that what will be presented are visions and interpretations that cannot be deduced, no matter what. There was a similarity between the reader’s vision and the vision that we will present, because this may cause major problems because the interpretation of the vision There are many factors that not only affect the details of the vision. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream Miri Ibn Sirin The interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream symbolizes a male child, and God knows best. Also, if you dream that he is carrying a sword, this indicates that the dreamer will have a great relationship and will have an excellent position in society. Just as a man who sees his wife in a dream takes a sword and encircles her, This is evidence that God - Glory be to Him - will grant the dreamer a baby girl, and God knows best. As for the dreamer who dreams that he is carrying four swords, this may be an indication of the number of children he will have, and God knows best. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing a sword in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi’s interpretation of seeing a sword In a dream, it refers to the money that the dreamer can earn, especially when the dreamer sees someone giving him a sword. As for the dream of drawing a sword, it may be a sign of the famous and great position that the dreamer can achieve in society, and God knows best. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Seeing a sword in Dreams by Ibn ShahinaIbn Shaheen is one of the most important scholars of dream interpretation, who believes that the interpretation of a sword in a dream is one of the visions that express crises and financial problems that the dreamer suffers from. Also, taking a dagger from someone in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be able to get rid of many conspiracies. And enemies. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream Seeing a sword in a dream for a manSeeing a sword in a dream for a man can be interpreted as good news about the money he will earn and an increase in capital or that he will find a prestigious job. Just like a man who sees a sword above his head, this may be good news He has a higher position in society - God willing. Whether the sword is broken in the dream, this may be a harbinger that the man will be fired from work or that there will be some disputes and marital problems. Seeing a sword in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream is for an unmarried girl. It symbolizes the purity, chastity, and good morals that characterize this girl, along with strength of character. Also, a sword in an unmarried woman’s dream can herald her marriage to a strong and honest man. As for an unmarried girl who dreams that she is holding a sword in her hand, this symbolizes honor and pride. And reaching high positions. Read also: A feast in a dream. Seeing a sword in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream for a married woman. She sees that a husband

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream for an unmarried woman?  A bird in his hand in a dream is for an unmarried woman, a yellow bird in a dream is for an unmarried woman, and a white bird in a dream is for an unmarried woman.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a bird is considered one of the happy visions for the soul, and there are many interpretations about it among both jurists and psychologists. Seeing a bird has many connotations that vary based on many considerations, including the color of the bird, as it may be white. , black or green, and it can be colored or yellow, and the bird can be in the hand or in the cage, and it can escape from it. What concerns us in this article is that we study all the specific cases and signals of seeing a bird in a dream for a single woman. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a vision? A bird in a dream for an unmarried woman? A bird in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a bird expresses the joy, enjoyment, and happiness of the soul in satisfying what it loves, and happiness, profit, and benefit according to your work and effort, and the integrity of intention and purity of the soul from the doubts of the world. This vision also indicates women and their conversations, and meetings that They gather from time to time, consult on many topics, and cooperate with some of the advice and instructions that are recited in these intimate councils and gatherings. The bird may seem small and resourceful, but seeing it in a dream represents high status, power, prestige, and prestige, reaping many profits and fruits, and obtaining a period Full of positive developments and changes at all levels. On the other hand, this vision symbolizes the person who is doing her best and does not receive proper appreciation, as she desperately attempts to prove herself and show different skills and abilities, but to no avail for others to recognize her. And if the unmarried woman sees that she has A bird, this indicates that she accompanies a woman similar to her in characteristics and attributes and the tendency to choose someone who has the same aspirations and goals and share them with her in her future projects and plans. An exchange of worries and anxieties. And if she sees that she is hunting a bird that was trying to escape from her, this indicates the money that she earns after long difficulties and difficulties and her ability to achieve her goals and desires, no matter how the circumstances fluctuate in her and the wind leads. Her misguidance, and the insistence on fighting battles, even if they are difficult. The bird in the individual dream of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the bird indicates a high status among people, and is characterized by a degree of danger if he disagrees with some, and he can have knowledge and knowledge without benefiting from it in anything referred to. If a girl sees a bird, this expresses her acquisition of different experiences, knowledge, and openness to different cultures. She may travel in the near future or move from one place to another in search of a goal and certain opportunities. Seeing a bird in her dream is also a sign of the confusion and disappointment that she sees in her life. , which makes others feel pity and sympathy for her, and some may be amazed by unexpected achievements and successes. This vision can be an indication of a love of fun and laughter for others, and the enjoyment of a fair shadow and the ability to seize hearts, attract attention, and get people out of their problems and concerns with jokes and sense of humor. If an unmarried woman sees that she is hunting a bird, this indicates that she will fall in love with a village person

title: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi, human children are considered among the most beautiful and beautiful creatures on the face of the earth. This is based on what was stated in the books of many great interpreters in the field of interpretation. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a girl in a dream is a worthy vision. Praise, this vision indicates the coming of goodness and a spacious life. In general, Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a baby or child in a dream is a sign of the coming of comfort, joy, happiness, and ample living, whether with money or children. A beautiful girl in a dream is a sign of good news and happy news that he will hear The dreamer soon. As for the girl whose appearance does not show beauty and wears clothes characterized by ugliness and dirt, her vision is a sign that she will be exposed to some problems and crises that the fortuneteller will suffer from and will cause him many problems. And sorrows. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a girl in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a new baby boy or baby girl in a dream is evidence of the happiness, joy, and prosperity that the dreamer is experiencing, and perhaps seeing the baby girl indicates the beginning of a happy new life, whether the marriage has passed. Whether through work. If the fortuneteller finds that the infant is in pain, sick, or seems tired or weak, this is a sign that he will face stress in his life, which will be a great burden on him. Many problems and crises. Interpretation of a dream about a girl who sees an unmarried woman. If an unmarried woman finds in a dream a girl who is distinguished by her beautiful appearance and attractive personality, this is good news for her that she can communicate with a person who has good appearance and a good personality. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream indicates ease The situation, the appearance of comfort, and getting rid of the difficulties and problems that a single woman faces in reality. If an unmarried woman carries a child who appears weak and sick, this may be a sign that she will face pressures and crises in the family environment or at work, but soon the unmarried girl can get rid of them and overcome On her.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a girl in a dream for a married woman. For a married woman who sees a girl in her dream and that girl was beautiful, this is good news that she will become pregnant soon, God willing, and the fetus will be one of her righteous offspring. Family. The dream may be an indication of the abundance of money for this woman, an increase in goodness and livelihood, a better position at work, or that her husband will obtain a good position. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a girl in a dream with a pregnant woman. Seeing a very beautiful pregnant girl indicates that she will give birth to a child, God willing. And you will enjoy health and wellness, and you will enjoy a degree of beauty in appearance and morals. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a girl in a dream about a man. If a man finds a beautiful young woman in a dream, this is good news for him of an increase that will come to him in his livelihood, money, or children. Seeing a skinny girl in a dream is a sign of crises and difficulties that the person is going through
